title: #92Noon! Boudreau/Lebrun/Russo/Florio/GorgArrigoni!
description: Wild coach Bruce Boudreau kicks off the show, followed by a full show of hockey heavy hitters. Pierre Lebrun on the hotline, Russo in studio, football with Florio, then Kevin Gorg and Brian Arrigoni both help preview the state hockey tourney!
itunes:summary: Wild coach Bruce Boudreau kicks off the show, followed by a full show of hockey heavy hitters. Pierre Lebrun on the hotline, Russo in studio, football with Florio, then Kevin Gorg and Brian Arrigoni both help preview the state hockey tourney!
